name: owlistic
description: Owlistic is a self-hosted note and knowledge management app designed for hierarchical organization. It features Markdown support, linked notes, and a responsive web interface for personal documentation.

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organize knowledge in tree-like structures with nested folders and sub-categories for logical organization

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write and format notes using Markdown syntax with live preview and syntax highlighting

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search across all notes with advanced filtering and tag-based discovery

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes to notes with version control and easy rollback to previous versions

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize content with flexible tagging system and tag-based filtering and categorization

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export notes and knowledge bases to various formats including PDF, HTML, and Markdown
